title: Onee-chan
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>Nozomi-san, have some tea.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Thank you, Ruby-chan. ....Hnn, it’s good.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Thank goodness. You see, Ruby brought some Japanese tea leaves we had at home to make this. It’s really delicious, so Ruby wanted you to also try it, Nozomi-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>You did that for me? You’re really thoughtful, aren’t you, Ruby-chan. I wish I had a cute little sister like you~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Cute!? Nozomi-san, please don’t tease me~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>But it’s the truth♪ Hey, Ruby-chan, can you try calling me “onee-chan” once?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Eeeh, call you that, Nozomi-san!? That’s embarrassing....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Just once! I really want to hear you say it~, can I?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Uu, uuu.... No-, Nozomi, onee-chan....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, you really are cute~! Dia-san must be so lucky to be called like that all the time, huh♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
